intro: Geranium mascatense var. yunnanense, commonly known as the Yunnan geranium, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Geraniaceae family and is characterized by its upright growth habit and showy, pink to red flowers. The plant typically features palmately lobed leaves with serrated edges, and it thrives in well-drained soil and full sun. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and can be found in alpine and rocky habitats. This variety is noted for its adaptability and resilience in cooler climates.
